chara.textHome: Shall we go?
You know, to the beach.

Is it strange to go to the beach
dressed like this
I have no sense for things like that.
I've gone to the ocean just once.
I was too young to remember much of it.

What do I need besides a
swimsuit and towel?

You should do warm-up exercises before
you swim, even if you're just playing.
An emergency in the water's no joke.

I never thought I'd spend a whole day
on the beach like this.

It was very different from my
usual daily routine...
It was a little invigorating.

The sky is the same whether I look at the
stars from my house or from the beach,

but they look quite different due to the
change in environment and position.
Are people moved by this kind of thing?

I always wear this when I participate in
club activities, so this is no different
from my everyday routine.

How about you? Does seeing me in my
swimsuit make you feel like you're
experiencing something out of the ordinary?
I sense a Witch... I'll go check it out.
Why are you stopping me?

It's fine, if I transform I'll be in my
usual outfit, so it'll be no different
than it always is.
Do you still not want me to go?

I tried arranging two mirrors to face
each other at midnight once.
They didn't reflect anything, of course.
Not my future self, nor my present.

When you take a closer look,
the sea is quite vast...and the beach
has a strong scent.

Perhaps I notice it more since I'm so used
to the size and smell of pools.

I presumed I could walk barefoot on the
sand, but there are glass shards
everywhere that make it unexpectedly risky.
I'm glad I wore my sandals.
I already finished my summer homework.

I'm doing my personal project now:
a 3-D map of a mountain I climbed.
It looks simple, but it's tricky to make.
Why do people use floats when they swim?
Do they use them because they can't swim?
Why come to the sea then?

Since I started hiking I've begun
researching the mountains on my own.

She finds them fun, so I want to know
about them too.

A strange smell started wafting out from the
Coordinator's shop when summer began.
Of course, Mitama insists otherwise.

Kokoro came to see me practice
during Swim Club.
She said she wanted to see me in action.
Isn't that a little odd?
Not that I disliked it or anything.

Kokoro did her best to find me
a perfect swimsuit.
I already have one, though, so I didn't buy it.
She looked disappointed...

Everyone on the swim team wears the same
swimsuit and swimming cap,so you can
hardly tell the difference between us...

How does she always know
which one is me?
